entries.arrived_at_delivery: Await the arrival of the pick-up ship at this location.
entries.arrived_at_pickup: The transport will be arriving in just a few moments.
entries.autorewardbody: You have been paid 5000 credits for services rendered to the Talus Space Station. That is all the assignments that we have for you at this time. Your assistance is greatly appreciated!
entries.docking_complete_delivery: Clamps are clear, we have the package.
entries.docking_complete_pickup: You're all clear pilot. Good luck, and stay out of trouble.
entries.docking_started_delivery: You are cleared for docking. Make it quick, pilot.
entries.docking_started_pickup: Docking request received. Preparing to transfer package.
entries.failed_destroyed: That didn't work exactly the way that we planned. We're scrapping the rest of your assignments. Return to the station if you want to try again.
entries.found_loc_d: Should be smooth sailing now. We're transmitting the location of the delivery. Meet your pick-up ship there.
entries.found_loc_p: Await the arrival of the transport at the specified location.
entries.hello_d: What was the hold up? We're getting behind schedule here.
entries.hello_p: Greetings. Sorry about the delay, but we should be good to go, now. Hope there wasn't too much trouble.
entries.quest_dock1_d: Move in close to the drop-off ship and press the 'U' key to receive the cargo.
entries.quest_dock2_d: Move in close to the pick-up ship and press the 'U' key to transfer the cargo.
entries.quest_location_d: This assignment will take place in the Naboo system.
entries.quest_rendezvous1_d: Travel to the specified location and await the arrival of the drop-off ship.
entries.quest_rendezvous2_d: Travel to the specified location and await the arrival of the pick-up ship.
entries.title: Naboo System: Drop off the Package
entries.title_d: The transport's hyperdrive has finally been repaired. You should now be able to make the scheduled pick-up and delivery as planned.
